head.title: Frédéric Tischler — Full-Stack Developer (Angular, Go, TypeScript, Java)
head.description: Modern, maintainable web applications. Apprentice at WeNégoce, trained at Zone01.

hero.title: Full-stack developer
hero.lead: Apprentice at WeNégoce and trained at Zone01, I turn business apps into Angular/Java platforms ready for continuous delivery: reusable components, controlled performance and actionable documentation.

skillsSection.title: Core capabilities
skillsSection.description: Technologies I rely on every day: robust backends, reactive interfaces and industrialised delivery.

pillars.title: Solid architecture
pillars.description: Clear modules, reusable components, controlled technical debt.

pillars.title: Smooth experience
pillars.description: Pragmatic UX, performance and accessibility by design.

pillars.title: Clean deliverables
pillars.description: Strict typing, useful documentation and focused tests.

projectsIntro.title: Featured projects
